# Tablas - Sexo


```{r echo = FALSE}
tab <- data %>%
     tab_prepend_names() %>% 
     tab_cols(total(),DC02) %>% 
	tab_cells(Q00010, 
	          Q00011,
	          Q00012,
	          Q00110_1 %to% Q00110_5,
	          Q00120_1 %to% Q00120_4,
	          Q00130_1 %to% Q00130_7,
	          mrset(..f(Q00140_), W1, W2, W3),
	          Q00150,
	          Q00160,
	          Q00170
	          ) %>%
	tab_stat_cpct() %>%
     tab_cells(Q00110_1 %to% Q00130_7) %>% 
     tab_stat_mean_sd_n() %>% 
     tab_pivot() %>% 
	tab_caption('Objetivo 1')
as.datatable_widget(tab, width=900)
```
